Weekly Spiritual Gatherings


Weekly Spiritual Gatherings

WSG is an effort by a group of students seeking Guidance and Islamic knowledge to provide a platform for people from all walks of life.
Amidst the challenges and responsibilities of the modern-day world, join us every week to nurture our connection with Allah SWT, discover the Prophetic ways and purify our heart from the spiritual diseases.

WSG is an effort by a group of students seeking Guidance and Islamic knowledge to provide a platform for people from all walks of life to understand the basics of Islam. “Basics” on which the Quran was sent down and “basics” which unite all of us to the one tradition that Our Beloved Prophet SW brought to us.
